subject: Re: Just got a zoom H2 and a Panasonic RR-DR60 Digital Voice Recorder ...woooooweeee
author: Jim
full_text:
Hows the DR60 working out? I use one myself. I also have good luck with the Sony ICD-B7 and B300 digital recorders.

I ran into this post by doing a googlee search....
I also have an H4 (first edition).

I just can't see how the scientific community can deny that EVP are real. :-)
